name: THEIA
description:
THEIA is a vertical shooter made for the A Game By Its Cover Jam 2017.

Controls
  • [WASD] or [ARROWS] - move
  • [SPACE] - shoot
  • [B] - bomb
  • [M] - mute
  • [ESC] - pause

Controllers are also supported.

Credits

The Famicase art that inspired this game was provided by Jonah Davidson.
